text: Hi, I am the host of this show "Cooking With Dog"
First, we will make two types of toppings for dumplings
Add sugar to Kinako, which is soy bean flour
For the second topping, grain black sesame until it gets smooth
Add sugar and mix well
Let's make a dough for the dumplings
Add glutinous powder and tofu into a bowl and mix by hand
if the dough is stick, add a little bit water
Knead until the dough is smooth
Let's make dumplings
split the dough into three equal pieces
divide into three medium pieces
and get three from each piece
you will have 27 pieces from the dough
and shape each piece into a ball
gently place the dumplings into a large boiling pot of water
boil 1 or 2 more minutes
after the dumplings float onto the surface
immerse the dumplings immediately into cold water and drain well
skewer three dumplings onto one stick and coat with ground black sesame
make another skewer of dumplings and coat with soy bean flour
cover with the extra soy bean flour and grounded black sesame
Now let's make sweet soy sauce
Add Mirin
sugar
and soy sauce
and bring to a boil
mix well and try not to burn the sauce
adjust the heat by lifting the pot and make the sauce thick
coat the dumplings with the sweet soy sauce
soy bean flour, black sesame and soy sauce
these dumplings are one of the healthiest Japanese sweets
